name: XR Layout
summary: "XR Layout" streamlines the process of redecorating a room. You can easily rearrange a variety of 3D models and wallpapers provided, or upload your own custom items. And you have the option to borrow 3D models and wallpapers from friends. This tool is valuable for both personal and business use, such as moving or designing new home layouts. It allows for testing various furniture placements in advance to reduce errors when purchasing actual pieces. Explore imaginative designs with "XR Layout".
